actions.recommendation: Vitamin D is important for our bone, mood, cognition and has anti inflammatory and immune boosting effects. Supplement with 5000iu daily and recheck your levels in 6 months.
Homocysteine - supplement with Vit B12, B6 and B2 as well as METHYLATED folate (B9). Can try 'homocysteine lowering formula' from solal or methylcare from metagenics.
Stress is having a huge impact on your wellbeing. Please try to prioritise self care. Set boundaries at work where possible and remember to take breaks.
